### Generated by BLACKBOX.AI
https://www.blackbox.ai
### YOU
create a voice to text translater chatbot
### BLACKBOX.AI


To create a voice-to-text translator chatbot, I'll need to:
1. Design a modern UI with chat interface and voice recording capability
2. Implement speech recognition using the Web Speech API
3. Add translation functionality (possibly using a free translation API)
4. Ensure responsive design for all device sizes
5. Include proper accessibility features

The chatbot should have:
- A chat display area
- A microphone button for voice input
- A text input fallback
- Clear visual feedback for recording state
- Language selection dropdowns
- Optionally, text-to-speech playback

I'll use plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without external libraries except for the Web Speech API which is built into modern browsers. The UI will be clean and intuitive with proper spacing and feedback states.


`voice-translator-chatbot.html`
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Voice-to-Text Translator Chatbot</title>
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary-color: #4361ee;
            --secondary-color: #3f37c9;
            --accent-color: #4895ef;
            --light-color: #f8f9fa;
            --dark-color: #212529;
            --success-color: #4cc9f0;
            --warning-color: #f8961e;
            --error-color: #f72585;
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa 0%, #c3cfe2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .chat-container {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 800px;
            height: 80vh;
            background-color: white;
            border-radius: 16px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .chat-header {
            background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
            color: white;
            padding: 16px 24px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .chat-header h1 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .chatbot-icon {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background-color: var(--light-color);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .chatbot-icon img {
            width: 30px;
            height: 30px;
        }

        .chat-messages {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 20px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 16px;
        }

        .message {
            max-width: 80%;
            padding: 12px 16px;
            border-radius: 18px;
            line-height: 1.4;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        .user-message {
            align-self: flex-end;
            background-color: var(--primary-color);
            color: white;
            border-bottom-right-radius: 4px;
        }

        .bot-message {
            align-self: flex-start;
            background-color: var(--light-color);
            color: var(--dark-color);
            border-bottom-left-radius: 4px;
        }

        .message-meta {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            margin-top: 4px;
            opacity: 0.7;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .controls {
            display: flex;
            border-top: 1px solid #eee;
            padding: 16px;
            background-color: white;
        }

        .language-selector {
            display: flex;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        select {
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 8px;
            flex: 1;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .input-group {
            display: flex;
            flex: 1;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        input[type="text"] {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px 16px;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 24px;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: border 0.2s;
        }

        input[type="text"]:focus {
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
        }

        .voice-btn {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-color: var(--primary-color);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
        }

        .voice-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--secondary-color);
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }

        .voice-btn.recording {
            animation: pulse 1.5s infinite;
            background-color: var(--error-color);
        }

        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(247, 37, 133, 0.4); }
            70% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 12px rgba(247, 37, 133, 0); }
            100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(247, 37, 133, 0); }
        }

        .send-btn {
            padding: 12px 24px;
            border-radius: 24px;
            background-color: var(--primary-color);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background-color 0.2s;
        }

        .send-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--secondary-color);
        }

        .status {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 8px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: var(--dark-color);
            opacity: 0.7;
        }

        /* Responsive adjustments */
        @media (max-width: 600px) {
            .chat-container {
                height: 90vh;
                border-radius: 0;
            }
            
            .language-selector {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="chat-container">
        <div class="chat-header">
            <h1>Voice Translator Chatbot</h1>
            <div class="chatbot-icon">
                <img src="https://placehold.co/30x30" alt="Cartoon robot face with friendly expression and blue color scheme" />
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="language-selector" style="padding: 8px 16px; background-color: #f8f9fa;">
            <select id="source-lang">
                <option value="en-US">English (US)</option>
                <option value="es-ES">Spanish</option>
                <option value="fr-FR">French</option>
                <option value="de-DE">German</option>
                <option value="it-IT">Italian</option>
                <option value="pt-BR">Portuguese</option>
                <option value="ru-RU">Russian</option>
                <option value="zh-CN">Chinese</option>
                <option value="ja-JP">Japanese</option>
                <option value="ko-KR">Korean</option>
            </select>
            <select id="target-lang">
                <option value="en-US">English (US)</option>
                <option value="es-ES">Spanish</option>
                <option value="fr-FR">French</option>
                <option value="de-DE">German</option>
                <option value="it-IT">Italian</option>
                <option value="pt-BR">Portuguese</option>
                <option value="ru-RU">Russian</option>
                <option value="zh-CN">Chinese</option>
                <option value="ja-JP">Japanese</option>
                <option value="ko-KR">Korean</option>
            </select>
        </div>

        <div class="chat-messages" id="chat-messages">
            <div class="message bot-message">
                Hello! I'm your voice translator assistant. Press the microphone button to speak, and I'll translate it to your selected language.
                <div class="message-meta">Bot â€¢ Just now</div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="status" id="status"></div>

        <div class="controls">
            <div class="input-group">
                <input type="text" id="text-input" placeholder="Type a message or speak using the microphone...">
                <button class="voice-btn" id="voice-btn">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
                        <path d="M12 1a3 3 0 0 0-3 3v8a3 3 0 0 0 6 0V4a3 3 0 0 0-3-3z"></path>
                        <path d="M19 10v2a7 7 0 0 1-14 0v-2"></path>
                        <line x1="12" y1="19" x2="12" y2="23"></line>
                        <line x1="8" y1="23" x2="16" y1="23"></line>
                    </svg>
                </button>
            </div>
            <button class="send-btn" id="send-btn">Send</button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const chatMessages = document.getElementById('chat-messages');
            const textInput = document.getElementById('text-input');
            const voiceBtn = document.getElementById('voice-btn');
            const sendBtn = document.getElementById('send-btn');
            const status = document.getElementById('status');
            const sourceLang = document.getElementById('source-lang');
            const targetLang = document.getElementById('target-lang');
            
            // Check for browser support
            if (!('webkitSpeechRecognition' in window) && !('SpeechRecognition' in window)) {
                status.textContent = 'Speech recognition not supported in this browser. Please use Chrome, Edge, or Safari.';
                voiceBtn.disabled = true;
            }
            
            // Create speech recognition
            const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
            const recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
            recognition.continuous = false;
            recognition.interimResults = false;
            
            // Set language
            recognition.lang = sourceLang.value;
            
            // Update recognition language when changed
            sourceLang.addEventListener('change', () => {
                recognition.lang = sourceLang.value;
            });
            
            // Voice button click handler
            voiceBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (voiceBtn.classList.contains('recording')) {
                    recognition.stop();
                    voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    status.textContent = 'Recording stopped';
                } else {
                    try {
                        recognition.start();
                        voiceBtn.classList.add('recording');
                        status.textContent = 'Listening... Speak now';
                        textInput.placeholder = 'Listening...';
                    } catch (e) {
                        status.textContent = 'Error: ' + e.message;
                    }
                }
            });
            
            // Speech recognition event handlers
            recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                const transcript = event.results[0][0].transcript;
                textInput.value = transcript;
                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                status.textContent = 'Processing your voice...';
                
                // Simulate translation - in a real app, you would call a translation API here
                setTimeout(() => {
                    addMessage(transcript, 'user', sourceLang.value);
                    const translatedText = simulateTranslation(transcript, sourceLang.value, targetLang.value);
                    addMessage(translatedText, 'bot', targetLang.value);
                    status.textContent = '';
                    textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
                }, 1000);
            };
            
            recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                status.textContent = 'Error occurred in recognition: ' + event.error;
                textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
            };
            
            recognition.onend = function() {
                if (voiceBtn.classList.contains('recording')) {
                    voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    status.textContent = 'Voice input ended';
                    textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
                }
            };
            
            // Send button click handler
            sendBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const message = textInput.value.trim();
                if (message) {
                    addMessage(message, 'user', sourceLang.value);
                    
                    // Simulate translation - in a real app, you would call a translation API here
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const translatedText = simulateTranslation(message, sourceLang.value, targetLang.value);
                        addMessage(translatedText, 'bot', targetLang.value);
                    }, 1000);
                    
                    textInput.value = '';
                }
            });
            
            // Enter key handler
            textInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
                if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                    sendBtn.click();
                }
            });
            
            // Add message to chat
            function addMessage(text, sender, lang) {
                const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
                messageDiv.classList.add('message');
                messageDiv.classList.add(sender === 'user' ? 'user-message' : 'bot-message');
                
                const languageLabel = getLanguageName(lang);
                
                messageDiv.innerHTML = `
                    ${text}
                    <div class="message-meta">
                        <span>${sender === 'user' ? 'You' : 'Bot'}</span>
                        <span>${languageLabel} â€¢ Just now</span>
                    </div>
                `;
                
                chatMessages.appendChild(messageDiv);
                chatMessages.scrollTop = chatMessages.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Simple translation simulation
            function simulateTranslation(text, sourceLang, targetLang) {
                if (sourceLang === targetLang) {
                    return text;
                }
                
                // Very simple simulation - in a real app, you would call a translation API
                const translations = {
                    'en-US': {
                        'es-ES': `(Spanish) ${text}`,
                        'fr-FR': `(French) ${text}`,
                        'de-DE': `(German) ${text}`,
                        'it-IT': `(Italian) ${text}`,
                        'pt-BR': `(Portuguese) ${text}`,
                        'ru-RU': `(Russian) ${text}`,
                        'zh-CN': `(Chinese) ${text}`,
                        'ja-JP': `(Japanese) ${text}`,
                        'ko-KR': `(Korean) ${text}`
                    }
                    // Other language mappings would go here
                };
                
                return translations[sourceLang]?.[targetLang] || `(Translated to ${targetLang}) ${text}`;
            }
            
            // Get language name from code
            function getLanguageName(code) {
                const languages = {
                    'en-US': 'English',
                    'es-ES': 'Spanish',
                    'fr-FR': 'French',
                    'de-DE': 'German',
                    'it-IT': 'Italian',
                    'pt-BR': 'Portuguese',
                    'ru-RU': 'Russian',
                    'zh-CN': 'Chinese',
                    'ja-JP': 'Japanese',
                    'ko-KR': 'Korean'
                };
                return languages[code] || code;
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Voice-to-Text Translator Chatbot</title>
    <style>
        :root {
            --primary-color: #4361ee;
            --secondary-color: #3f37c9;
            --accent-color: #4895ef;
            --light-color: #f8f9fa;
            --dark-color: #212529;
            --success-color: #4cc9f0;
            --warning-color: #f8961e;
            --error-color: #f72585;
        }

        * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa 0%, #c3cfe2 100%);
            min-height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .chat-container {
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 800px;
            height: 80vh;
            background-color: white;
            border-radius: 16px;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .chat-header {
            background: linear-gradient(to right, var(--primary-color), var(--secondary-color));
            color: white;
            padding: 16px 24px;
            display: flex;

            justify-content: space-between;
        }

            align-self: flex-start;

            border-bottom-left-radius: 4px;
        }

        .message-meta {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            margin-top: 4px;
            opacity: 0.7;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .controls {
            display: flex;
            border-top: 1px solid #eee;
            padding: 16px;
            background-color: white;
        }

        .language-selector {
            display: flex;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        select {
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 8px;
            flex: 1;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .input-group {
            display: flex;
            flex: 1;
            gap: 8px;
        }

        input[type="text"] {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 12px 16px;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 24px;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: border 0.2s;
        }

        input[type="text"]:focus {
            border-color: var(--primary-color);
        }

        .voice-btn {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-color: var(--primary-color);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
        }

        .voice-btn:hover {
            background-color: var(--secondary-color);
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }

        .voice-btn.recording {
            animation: pulse 1.5s infinite;
            background-color: var(--error-color);
        }

            0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(247, 37, 133, 0.4); }
            70% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 12px rgba(247, 37, 133, 0); }
            100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(247, 37, 133, 0); }

<body>
    <div class="chat-container">
        <div class="chat-header">
            <h1>Voice Translator Chatbot</h1>
            <div class="chatbot-icon">
                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/d0bf62b9-6dcc-4a5e-bd4c-59bf605e679a.png" alt="Cartoon robot face with friendly expression and blue color scheme" />
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="language-selector" style="padding: 8px 16px; background-color: #f8f9fa;">
            <select id="source-lang">
                <option value="en-US">English (US)</option>
                <option value="es-ES">Spanish</option>
                <option value="fr-FR">French</option>
                <option value="de-DE">German</option>
                <option value="it-IT">Italian</option>
                <option value="pt-BR">Portuguese</option>
                <option value="ru-RU">Russian</option>
                <option value="zh-CN">Chinese</option>
                <option value="ja-JP">Japanese</option>
                <option value="ko-KR">Korean</option>
            </select>
            <select id="target-lang">
                <option value="en-US">English (US)</option>
                <option value="es-ES">Spanish</option>
                <option value="fr-FR">French</option>
                <option value="de-DE">German</option>
                <option value="it-IT">Italian</option>
                <option value="pt-BR">Portuguese</option>
                <option value="ru-RU">Russian</option>
                <option value="zh-CN">Chinese</option>
                <option value="ja-JP">Japanese</option>
                <option value="ko-KR">Korean</option>
            </select>
        </div>

        <div class="chat-messages" id="chat-messages">
            <div class="message bot-message">
                Hello! I'm your voice translator assistant. Press the microphone button to speak, and I'll translate it to your selected language.
                <div class="message-meta">Bot â€¢ Just now</div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="status" id="status"></div>

        <div class="controls">
            <div class="input-group">
                <input type="text" id="text-input" placeholder="Type a message or speak using the microphone...">
                <button class="voice-btn" id="voice-btn">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
                        <path d="M12 1a3 3 0 0 0-3 3v8a3 3 0 0 0 6 0V4a3 3 0 0 0-3-3z"></path>
                        <path d="M19 10v2a7 7 0 0 1-14 0v-2"></path>
                        <line x1="12" y1="19" x2="12" y2="23"></line>
                        <line x1="8" y1="23" x2="16" y1="23"></line>
                    </svg>
                </button>
            </div>
            <button class="send-btn" id="send-btn">Send</button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const chatMessages = document.getElementById('chat-messages');
            const textInput = document.getElementById('text-input');
            const voiceBtn = document.getElementById('voice-btn');
            const sendBtn = document.getElementById('send-btn');
            const status = document.getElementById('status');
            const sourceLang = document.getElementById('source-lang');
            const targetLang = document.getElementById('target-lang');
            
            // Check for browser support
            if (!('webkitSpeechRecognition' in window) && !('SpeechRecognition' in window)) {
                status.textContent = 'Speech recognition not supported in this browser. Please use Chrome, Edge, or Safari.';
                voiceBtn.disabled = true;
            }
            
            // Create speech recognition
            const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
            const recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
            recognition.continuous = false;
            recognition.interimResults = false;
            
            // Set language
            recognition.lang = sourceLang.value;
            
            // Update recognition language when changed
            sourceLang.addEventListener('change', () => {
                recognition.lang = sourceLang.value;
            });
            
            // Voice button click handler
            voiceBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (voiceBtn.classList.contains('recording')) {
                    recognition.stop();
                    voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    status.textContent = 'Recording stopped';
                } else {
                    try {
                        recognition.start();
                        voiceBtn.classList.add('recording');
                        status.textContent = 'Listening... Speak now';
                        textInput.placeholder = 'Listening...';
                    } catch (e) {
                        status.textContent = 'Error: ' + e.message;
                    }
                }
            });
            
            // Speech recognition event handlers
            recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                const transcript = event.results[0][0].transcript;
                textInput.value = transcript;
                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                status.textContent = 'Processing your voice...';
                
                // Simulate translation - in a real app, you would call a translation API here
                setTimeout(() => {
                    addMessage(transcript, 'user', sourceLang.value);
                    const translatedText = simulateTranslation(transcript, sourceLang.value, targetLang.value);
                    addMessage(translatedText, 'bot', targetLang.value);
                    status.textContent = '';
                    textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
                }, 1000);
            };
            
            recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                status.textContent = 'Error occurred in recognition: ' + event.error;
                textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
            };
            
            recognition.onend = function() {
                if (voiceBtn.classList.contains('recording')) {
                    voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    status.textContent = 'Voice input ended';
                    textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
                }
            };
            
            // Send button click handler
            sendBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const message = textInput.value.trim();
                if (message) {
                    addMessage(message, 'user', sourceLang.value);
                    
                    // Simulate translation - in a real app, you would call a translation API here
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const translatedText = simulateTranslation(message, sourceLang.value, targetLang.value);
                        addMessage(translatedText, 'bot', targetLang.value);
                    }, 1000);
                    
                    textInput.value = '';
                }
            });
            
            // Enter key handler
            textInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
                if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                    sendBtn.click();
                }
            });
            
            // Add message to chat
            function addMessage(text, sender, lang) {
                const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
                messageDiv.classList.add('message');
                messageDiv.classList.add(sender === 'user' ? 'user-message' : 'bot-message');
                
                const languageLabel = getLanguageName(lang);
                
                messageDiv.innerHTML = `
                    ${text}
                    <div class="message-meta">
                        <span>${sender === 'user' ? 'You' : 'Bot'}</span>
                        <span>${languageLabel} â€¢ Just now</span>
                    </div>
                `;
                
                chatMessages.appendChild(messageDiv);
                chatMessages.scrollTop = chatMessages.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Simple translation simulation
            function simulateTranslation(text, sourceLang, targetLang) {
                if (sourceLang === targetLang) {
                    return text;
                }
                
                // Very simple simulation - in a real app, you would call a translation API
                const translations = {
                    'en-US': {
                        'es-ES': `(Spanish) ${text}`,
                        'fr-FR': `(French) ${text}`,
                        'de-DE': `(German) ${text}`,
                        'it-IT': `(Italian) ${text}`,
                        'pt-BR': `(Portuguese) ${text}`,
                        'ru-RU': `(Russian) ${text}`,
                        'zh-CN': `(Chinese) ${text}`,
                        'ja-JP': `(Japanese) ${text}`,
                        'ko-KR': `(Korean) ${text}`
                    }
                    // Other language mappings would go here
                };
                
                return translations[sourceLang]?.[targetLang] || `(Translated to ${targetLang}) ${text}`;
            }
            
            // Get language name from code
            function getLanguageName(code) {
                const languages = {
                    'en-US': 'English',
                    'es-ES': 'Spanish',
                    'fr-FR': 'French',
                    'de-DE': 'German',
                    'it-IT': 'Italian',
                    'pt-BR': 'Portuguese',
                    'ru-RU': 'Russian',
                    'zh-CN': 'Chinese',
                    'ja-JP': 'Japanese',
                    'ko-KR': 'Korean'
                };
                return languages[code] || code;
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
### YOU
voice button is not working
### BLACKBOX.AI

        .chatbot-icon {

        .chatbot-icon img {
            width: 30px;

        }

        .message {
            max-width: 80%;

            line-height: 1.4;
            position: relative;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
        }

        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }

        .user-message {
            align-self: flex-end;
            background-color: var(--primary-color);
            color: white;
            border-bottom-right-radius: 4px;
        }

        .bot-message {
            align-self: flex-start;
            background-color: var(--light-color);

        }

        .voice-btn {
            width: 50px;

        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(247, 37, 133, 0.4); }

            100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(247, 37, 133, 0); }

        .send-btn {

        /* Responsive adjustments */
        @media (max-width: 600px) {
            .chat-container {
                height: 90vh;
                border-radius: 0;
            }
            
            .language-selector {
                flex-direction: column;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="chat-container">
        <div class="chat-header">
            <h1>Voice Translator Chatbot</h1>
            <div class="chatbot-icon">
                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/d0bf62b9-6dcc-4a5e-bd4c-59bf605e679a.png" alt="Cartoon robot face with friendly expression and blue color scheme" />
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="language-selector" style="padding: 8px 16px; background-color: #f8f9fa;">
            <select id="source-lang">
                <option value="en-US">English (US)</option>
                <option value="es-ES">Spanish</option>
                <option value="fr-FR">French</option>
                <option value="de-DE">German</option>
                <option value="it-IT">Italian</option>
                <option value="pt-BR">Portuguese</option>
                <option value="ru-RU">Russian</option>
                <option value="zh-CN">Chinese</option>
                <option value="ja-JP">Japanese</option>
                <option value="ko-KR">Korean</option>
            </select>
            <select id="target-lang">
                <option value="en-US">English (US)</option>
                <option value="es-ES">Spanish</option>
                <option value="fr-FR">French</option>
                <option value="de-DE">German</option>
                <option value="it-IT">Italian</option>
                <option value="pt-BR">Portuguese</option>
                <option value="ru-RU">Russian</option>
                <option value="zh-CN">Chinese</option>
                <option value="ja-JP">Japanese</option>
                <option value="ko-KR">Korean</option>
            </select>
        </div>

        <div class="chat-messages" id="chat-messages">
            <div class="message bot-message">
                Hello! I'm your voice translator assistant. Press the microphone button to speak, and I'll translate it to your selected language.
                <div class="message-meta">Bot â€¢ Just now</div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="status" id="status"></div>

        <div class="controls">
            <div class="input-group">
                <input type="text" id="text-input" placeholder="Type a message or speak using the microphone...">
                <button class="voice-btn" id="voice-btn">
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
                        <path d="M12 1a3 3 0 0 0-3 3v8a3 3 0 0 0 6 0V4a3 3 0 0 0-3-3z"></path>
                        <path d="M19 10v2a7 7 0 0 1-14 0v-2"></path>
                        <line x1="12" y1="19" x2="12" y2="23"></line>
                        <line x1="8" y1="23" x2="16" y1="23"></line>
                    </svg>
                </button>
            </div>
            <button class="send-btn" id="send-btn">Send</button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const chatMessages = document.getElementById('chat-messages');
            const textInput = document.getElementById('text-input');
            const voiceBtn = document.getElementById('voice-btn');
            const sendBtn = document.getElementById('send-btn');
            const status = document.getElementById('status');
            const sourceLang = document.getElementById('source-lang');
            const targetLang = document.getElementById('target-lang');
            
            // Check for browser support
            if (!('webkitSpeechRecognition' in window) && !('SpeechRecognition' in window)) {
                status.textContent = 'Speech recognition not supported in this browser. Please use Chrome, Edge, or Safari.';
                voiceBtn.disabled = true;
                return;
            }
            
            if (!navigator.mediaDevices || !navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia) {
                status.textContent = 'Microphone access not supported in this browser/context (secure HTTPS or localhost required).';
                voiceBtn.disabled = true;
                return;
            }
            
            // Create speech recognition
            const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
            const recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
            recognition.continuous = false;
            recognition.interimResults = false;
            
            // Set language
            recognition.lang = sourceLang.value;
            
            // Update recognition language when changed
            sourceLang.addEventListener('change', () => {
                recognition.lang = sourceLang.value;
            });
            
            // Voice button click handler
            voiceBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (voiceBtn.classList.contains('recording')) {
                    recognition.stop();
                    voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    status.textContent = 'Recording stopped';
                } else {
                    try {
                        navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({ audio: true })
                            .then(() => {
                                recognition.start();
                                voiceBtn.classList.add('recording');
                                status.textContent = 'Listening... Speak now';
                                textInput.placeholder = 'Listening...';
                            })
                            .catch((err) => {
                                status.textContent = 'Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access.';
                                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                                console.error('Microphone permission error:', err);
                            });
                    } catch (e) {
                        status.textContent = 'Error: ' + e.message;
                        voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    }
                }
            });
            
            // Speech recognition event handlers
            recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                const transcript = event.results[0][0].transcript;
                textInput.value = transcript;
                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                status.textContent = 'Processing your voice...';
                
                // Simulate translation - in a real app, you would call a translation API here
                setTimeout(() => {
                    addMessage(transcript, 'user', sourceLang.value);
                    const translatedText = simulateTranslation(transcript, sourceLang.value, targetLang.value);
                    addMessage(translatedText, 'bot', targetLang.value);
                    status.textContent = '';
                    textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
                }, 1000);
            };
            
            recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                if (event.error === 'not-allowed') {
                    status.textContent = 'Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone permission';
                } else if (event.error === 'no-speech') {
                    status.textContent = 'No speech detected. Please try again';
                } else {
                    status.textContent = 'Error occurred: ' + event.error;
                }
                textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
            };
            
            recognition.onend = function() {
                if (voiceBtn.classList.contains('recording')) {
                    voiceBtn.classList.remove('recording');
                    status.textContent = 'Voice input ended';
                    textInput.placeholder = 'Type a message or speak using the microphone...';
                }
            };
            
            // Send button click handler
            sendBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const message = textInput.value.trim();
                if (message) {
                    addMessage(message, 'user', sourceLang.value);
                    
                    // Simulate translation - in a real app, you would call a translation API here
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const translatedText = simulateTranslation(message, sourceLang.value, targetLang.value);
                        addMessage(translatedText, 'bot', targetLang.value);
                    }, 1000);
                    
                    textInput.value = '';
                }
            });
            
            // Enter key handler
            textInput.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
                if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                    sendBtn.click();
                }
            });
            
            // Add message to chat
            function addMessage(text, sender, lang) {
                const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
                messageDiv.classList.add('message');
                messageDiv.classList.add(sender === 'user' ? 'user-message' : 'bot-message');
                
                const languageLabel = getLanguageName(lang);
                
                messageDiv.innerHTML = `
                    ${text}
                    <div class="message-meta">
                        <span>${sender === 'user' ? 'You' : 'Bot'}</span>
                        <span>${languageLabel} â€¢ Just now</span>
                    </div>
                `;
                
                chatMessages.appendChild(messageDiv);
                chatMessages.scrollTop = chatMessages.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Simple translation simulation
            function simulateTranslation(text, sourceLang, targetLang) {
                if (sourceLang === targetLang) {
                    return text;
                }
                
                // Very simple simulation - in a real app, you would call a translation API
                const translations = {
                    'en-US': {
                        'es-ES': `(Spanish) ${text}`,
                        'fr-FR': `(French) ${text}`,
                        'de-DE': `(German) ${text}`,
                        'it-IT': `(Italian) ${text}`,
                        'pt-BR': `(Portuguese) ${text}`,
                        'ru-RU': `(Russian) ${text}`,
                        'zh-CN': `(Chinese) ${text}`,
                        'ja-JP': `(Japanese) ${text}`,
                        'ko-KR': `(Korean) ${text}`
                    }
                    // Other language mappings would go here
                };
                
                return translations[sourceLang]?.[targetLang] || `(Translated to ${targetLang}) ${text}`;
            }
            
            // Get language name from code
            function getLanguageName(code) {
                const languages = {
                    'en-US': 'English',
                    'es-ES': 'Spanish',
                    'fr-FR': 'French',
                    'de-DE': 'German',
                    'it-IT': 'Italian',
                    'pt-BR': 'Portuguese',
                    'ru-RU': 'Russian',
                    'zh-CN': 'Chinese',
                    'ja-JP': 'Japanese',
                    'ko-KR': 'Korean'
                };
                return languages[code] || code;
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
